subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets celebrated the signing of Michael Conforto, its first-round draft pick, and also welcomed his agent, Scott Boras. The good feelings continued in a 7-1 win over the Marlins.
snippet: The Mets celebrated the signing of Michael Conforto, its first-round draft pick, and also welcomed his agent, Scott Boras. The good feelings continued in a 7-1 win over the Marlins.
